title: Your favorite champion is suddenly standing beside you.
body:
What do they say?

{{champion:105}} "Is that some fish? TRAITOR!!!!!"

replies.body: I'm standing? I'm standing! I'M STANDING HOW AM I STANDING?! {{champion:267}}

standing/flopping
there?
{{champion:102}} "Who the hell are you, where the hell am I, and- Ooh, is that chili?"
dont let her sneeze
{{champion:268}} Come young one, we have much work to do.
The reconstruction of shurima will take more than one emperor

{{champion:33}} *looks around confused*

{{summoner:7}}  "I think ya misclicked with teleport bud."

{{champion:37}}  

....Well. This might be a bit of a one-sided conversation.

{{champion:4}} "howdy darlin'"
Me: -swoon-

> [{quoted}](name=Shinie Gallade,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jsos6kdw,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-03-20T08:33:34.338+0000)
>
> {{champion:4}} "howdy darlin'"
> Me: -swoon-

Yes.
we need some {{champion:104}}  here

Oh hey it's my mom and she is going to dunk my PC.

{{champion:122}} : APAGA LA COMPUTADORA! *ults PC*
(Translates to: TURN OFF THE COMPUTER!)

{{summoner:6}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 


True story....My mom is actually standing next to me and I swear she looks like Darius when she is mad. 
So when I saw this thread I just had to. (And yes my mom has actually snapped like that and smashed my laptop in half with one fist.)

I don't have a favorite champion but,
If {{champion:29}} was next to me....
He would say, "You smell AWFUL! What scent do you use? I NEED IT FOR MY COLLECTION!"

I need to shower...

{{champion:32}}: Come play with me!
Me: http://www.h3dwallpapers.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/Grumpy_cat_quotes_no-5.jpg

{{champion:131}} "When is the full moon on this planet?"

Me: Um...*looks up a calendar and tells her*

{{champion:131}} "Knock knock."

Me: Oh good lord...

but srsly, we'd probably start trading horribly corny jokes while watching the full moon.
Mundo! {{champion:36}}
{{champion:429}}  Broken any promises lately
Then lemme THROW U TO VENGENCE!

{{champion:131}}  "Do you praise the moon"

"Can I have cool powers?"
{{champion:131}} "Sure"
"Yep."

{{champion:31}} "Anyone for a spot of tea?"(at least I really hope that's what he says 'cause otherwise I'm getting eaten...)

{{champion:17}} I probably wouldn't even notice...

Not my favorite, but I'd assume Viktor would be pretty chill.

And try to evolve me.

{{champion:112}} IT SHALL BE GLORIOUS.
{{champion:238}} Embrace the Shadows. Or Die in Darkness...
{{champion:16}} cure {{champion:90}}s space aids casts wish there
{{champion:33}} Ok

{{champion:107}}: "(Roars Deeply Into My Ears)
Me:  "Shush, dude. Parents are asleep.
{{champion:107}} "Oh, sorry."

{{champion:157}} *grabs blow dryer and points it in my face* FACE THE WIND


{{champion:102}}
me: What the fuck... ok... ok... dont sneeze... please dont sneeze...
{{champion:102}} Where do you keep your chili
{{champion:150}} i pet him. i hope he is cuddly...

Me: Hi there....
{{champion:254}} : YOUR UNDER ARREST! *punches me many many times*
Me: why?
{{champion:254}} : How should i know? i just like punching.
You must be black
You must be racist
XD Take a joke man

{{champion:101}} Come, You will wield true POWER!!

Me: OK BUD
more like he'll disintegrate you

{{champion:33}} "..."

"...Hey! Uh...welcome to the pool."

{{champion:33}} "..."

"...Wanna go for a swim?"

{{champion:33}} "Ok"
Im Ok {{champion:33}}
{{champion:27}}- *"How about a drink?"*

{{champion:103}} Is that me on the screen? *referring to my second screen which only has the desktop image on it*

Me: *turns confused for a second then is immobilised by love!*
{{champion:107}}  *You have earned a good death. I've earned the kill!*

{{champion:17}} 
hahaha. hahaha. hahahahahaha.
rip
{{champion:35}} "ummm could you show me how to use those box things? please dont kill me"
Tell me a joke!
Who? {{champion:42}} ? Yeah, he's actually piloting the helicopter. I'm just a co-pilot.
{{champion:143}} Just don't give me poison Ivy and we're good.
